title: Savings and Loan Associations
content:
Savings and Loan Associations

State Regulations

Supervisory Policy 1 - Authorization for Trust Powers for Savings and Loan Associations, version 4 (§ 1.1 to 1.4)

Supervisory Policy 2

Supervisory Procedure 100

Supervisory Procedure 101 - Application for Savings and Loan Association Branch Offices, version 3 (§ 101.1 to 101.2)

Supervisory Procedure 110 - Merger of Savings and Loan Association or Savings Bank into a Savings and Loan Association, version 3 (§ 110.1 to 110.5)

Supervisory Procedure 111 - Conversion of Savings and Loan Association into Savings Bank, version 3 (§ 111.1 to 111.3)

Supervisory Procedure 112 - Conversion of Federal Savings and Loan Association to State Charter, version 2 (§ 112.1 to 112.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
